data.price: Dhugumatti, Rabbiin amaanawwan gara abbootii isiitti geessuufi yeroo nama gidduutti murteessitanis haqaan murteessuu isin ajaja. Dhugumatti, wanti Rabbiin ittiin isin gorsu (barsiisu) waa tolee. Rabbiin dhagayaa, argaa ta'e.
data.arabic: ۞ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَأۡمُرُكُمۡ أَن تُؤَدُّواْ ٱلۡأَمَٰنَٰتِ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهَا وَإِذَا حَكَمۡتُم بَيۡنَ ٱلنَّاسِ أَن تَحۡكُمُواْ بِٱلۡعَدۡلِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ نِعِمَّا يَعِظُكُم بِهِۦٓۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ سَمِيعَۢا بَصِيرٗا

dua.name: Dua for Social Responsibility
dua.significanceReason: Emphasizes ethical conduct, trustworthiness, and responsible engagement in community affairs.
